statements: DELETE FROM total_landed_cost WHERE shipment_id = 456 AND product_id = 'P123';
DELETE FROM total_landed_cost WHERE shipment_id = 789 AND product_id = 'P456' AND date_received < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM costs WHERE customs_cost > 500)
DELETE FROM costs WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_price < 50)
DELETE FROM shipping WHERE shipping_id = 100 AND shipping_cost > 50;
DELETE FROM customs WHERE customs_description LIKE '%restricted%';
DELETE FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 101);
